entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI failure in Wasm Linux: Could not restore / could not find `Microsoft.NET.Workload.Mono.ToolChain.net7.Manifest-7.0.100/7.0.0-ci` #76908
  • CI failure in coreclr linux arm crossbuild checked: Generate CORE_ROOT dotnet restore error #76906
  • CI build failure in Linux Musl Arm64: Generating native code, crossgen2.ilc.rsp exited with code 139 (segmentation fault) #76905
  • Refactor and Update Main Workflow Documentation #76896
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add freezing APIs to JsonTypeInfo #76893
    8.0.0
  • Consider expanding number formatting cache to larger values #76888
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_PriorityQueue<Int32, Int32> #76887
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #76886
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #76885
  • [Ubuntu 22.10] error: definition of builtin function '__cpuid' when using clang-15: could the fix be backported to 6.0.1XX? #76882
  • [Android] Inherited internal properties are not returned via reflection #76881
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_23159\\GitHub_23159\\GitHub_23159.cmd #76880
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'putArgRegNode->gtOper == GT_PUTARG_REG' #76879
    8.0.0
  • Directory.GetFiles throws DirectoryNotFoundException if path contains ''$'\240''a' on Linux #76877
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] RootHidden is not working correctly in DebuggerTypeProxy #76876
    8.0.0
  • NET 6 Application crashes without a StackTrace (I've a MiniDump) Code: 0xc0000374 #76875
  • JIT: suboptimal block layout #76872
    Future
  • runtimelab yml no longer works as template for experiment branches #76866
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\generics\\Layout\\General\\Base02b_seq_ser\\Base02b_seq_ser.cmd #76862
    8.0.0
  • Marshal.PtrToStructure CLR Error on .NET 6.0 #76861
  • Assert failure: (last_plug_size & (sizeof(PTR_PTR) - 1)) == 0 #76858
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: (size (xl) > 0) #76857
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Cloning/Runtime_61040_5/Runtime_61040_5.sh #76855
    8.0.0
  • IOCompletionCallback of ThreadPoolBoundHandle causes the app to crash #76852
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure: GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen.cmd #76856
    8.0.0
  • BigInteger ModPow or aritchmeric within internal buffer handling #76842
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Reduce LSDA size #76895
    8.0.0
  • Investigate simplifying runtime test xunit wrapper generation #42969
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\mcc\\interop\\mcc_i61\\mcc_i61.cmd #76865
    8.0.0
  • Office Interop on .net core not working with Office 2021, but works on framework. #76833
  • [API Proposal]: DispatchProxy.Create<TProxy>(Type interfaceType) #67444
    8.0.0
  • DateTime.ParseExact randomly yielding wrong DateTime.Kind #76037
  • .NET CLR profiling API does not return ELEMENT_TYPE_GENERICINST on generic method #75903
    8.0.0
  • Exception Type not loged to EventLog when a Exception crashes the application #76741
  • Strange performance loss when using conditional Vector<T> and CopyBlockUnaligned #76844
  • Blazor Wasm Crashes if another wasm instance is running in the service worker. #76026
    6.0.11
  • An overwritten ToString method does not show the content of an item in Blazor WASM (while DebuggerDisplay works now) #76748
  • OpenXml throws a different exception given identical code and similar build configuration for two distinct solutions. Why? #76744
    Future
  • JIT: Optimize "X & 1 == 0" to "X & 1" #61412
    Future
  • Microsoft.NETCore.App.Crossgen2.sfxproj in source-build #74721
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: A ALC must be unload. #76864
  • Socket.Poll(μsTimeout, SelectMode.SelectRead) behavior is confusing #32719
    Future
  • JsonDocument.GetString implementation is not thread safe #76440
    Future
  • Console.In.Read{Line,ToEnd} don't recognize EOF from terminal #76821
    7.0.0
  • Add `TransactionManager.ImplicitDistributedTransactions` #76469
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'h->bbFallsThrough()' #76346
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.WildcardExpressions api #74862
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2017800 #76907
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Check if interval interferes with the call #76904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • retire EOL Fedora 34 #76902
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Migrate host.tests from Newtonsoft to STJ #76901
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoid exception when calling WhenAny with a null parameter #76900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. (#76540) #76899
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Increase distributed transaction test timeout for MSDTC communication failures #76892
    area-System.Transactions
  • Only copy coreclr binaries to core_root when targeting coreclr #76890
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for using sccache on Unix #76889
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix profiler tail call insertion logic for FIELD_LIST #76883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Fix usage of implicit pointer types in a few more places… #76878
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Detect specifical character in EnumConverter.cs #76873
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAny{Except}InRange in RegexCompiler / source generator #76859
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • De-duplicate Unix Environment variables between Mono and native AOT #76853
  • [JIT] x86 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cache allregs to avoid checking the type repeatedly #76850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Value of TwoDigitYearMax to 2049 #76848
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Enable stable branding for GA #76849
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Bump intellisense to include latest docs for RC2 #76846
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Bump intellisense to include latest docs for RC2 #76847
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Fix gc hole in Frozen.cs #76868
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Update Arm64 cross build container #76897
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Double the size of new frozen segments #76870
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Doc improvements #76863
    area-Meta
  • [NativeAOT] Don't unnecessarily allocate ObjectNodeSection objects #76894
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #76884
    area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0] Fix regression in `JsonIgnoreAttribute` handling of unsupported property types #76869
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Reduce CoreCLR PAL #76832
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #76481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • [test][tvos] Disable InvalidIVSizes overflow case for tvos #76725
    area-System.Security, os-tvos
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Abs intrinsics for Amd64 #76668
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugger behavior when the type has ToString method overridden #76780
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add more optimizations for (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/61412) #74806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Ensure reflection property metadata is instantiated lazily #76828
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix JsonDocument thread safety. #76716
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Optimize out some ldloca uses #76669
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions (#76376) #76838
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix loop canonicalization for call-finally case #76734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Reduce CoreCLR PAL" #76860
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Improve performance of integer formatting #76726
    area-System.Runtime
  • Use property AutoreleasePoolSupport in test #76800
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution

Updated

  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. #76540
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove libstdc++ dependency from NativeAOT #76705
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Don't generate a nearly empty file #76835
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: extend forward sub to handle adjacent assignments #75565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Add the ability to start and stop IHostedService instances concurrently #75894
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • Add specific formatting string for SSA numbers #76706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ReadOnly{Observable}Collection/Dictionary.Empty #76764
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness for spans of elements #76339
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use hashcodes when looking up the JsonSerializerOptions global cache. #76782
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add new `runtime-wasm-features` pipeline #76822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #76743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Use metadata names for SIMD intrinsic method recognition #76786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include hostcommon sources in hostfxr static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
